|°C|C = {{#switch:{{{3|}}}
|°F|F =1.8
|K=1
|°R|R =1.8
}}
|°F|F = {{#switch:{{{3|}}}
|°C|C =1/(1.8)
|K=1/(1.8)
|°R|R =1
}}
|K = {{#switch:{{{3|}}}
|°C|C =1
|°F|F =1.8
|°R|R =1.8
}}
|°R|R = {{#switch:{{{3|}}}
|°C|C =1/(1.8)
|°F|F =1
|K=1/(1.8)
}}
}} {{#switch:{{{2|}}}
|°C|C = {{#switch:{{{3|}}}
|°F|F = + 32
|K= + 273.15
|°R|R = + 491.67
}}
|°F|F = {{#switch:{{{3|}}}
|°C|C = - (32/1.8)
|K= + (459.67/1.8)
|°R|R = + 459.67
}}
|K = {{#switch:{{{3|}}}
|°C|C = - 273.15
|°F|F = - 459.67
}}
|°R|R = {{#switch:{{{3|}}}
|°C|C = - 273.15
|°F|F = - 459.67
}}

|kg   =0.45359237
